content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":119851,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時間が必要なら……","translatedEnglishLine":"If you need time..."},{"lineNumber":119852,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達にはいくらでもあるのだから」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have as much time as we want."},{"lineNumber":119853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't that right?"},{"lineNumber":119854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Yes."},{"lineNumber":119855,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe."},{"lineNumber":119856,"originalJapaneseLine":"アルカリアの頭がシャロンの手によって撫でられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alcaria's head was gently stroked by Sharon's hand."},{"lineNumber":119857,"originalJapaneseLine":"とても優しく、少しでも傷を癒そうとするように。","translatedEnglishLine":"Very gently, as if trying to heal even the slightest wound."},{"lineNumber":119858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":119859,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちっともそんな風には見えんがなあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It doesn't look like that at all, though."},{"lineNumber":119860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どーだ？　俺も怖いか？","translatedEnglishLine":"How about it? Am I scary too?"},{"lineNumber":119861,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heyyy."},{"lineNumber":119862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah!"},{"lineNumber":119863,"originalJapaneseLine":"デリカシーゼロでランスが","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, with zero delicacy,"},{"lineNumber":119864,"originalJapaneseLine":"アルカリアの頭をぽんぽんした。","translatedEnglishLine":"patted Alcaria's head."},{"lineNumber":119865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":119866,"originalJapaneseLine":"アルカリアはポカンとした直後――","translatedEnglishLine":"Right after Alcaria was stunned—"},{"lineNumber":119867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うえええええええん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Waaaaaah!"},{"lineNumber":119868,"originalJapaneseLine":"――泣いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"—She cried."},{"lineNumber":119869,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎょっ！　何も泣くことないだろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa! There's no reason to cry!"},{"lineNumber":119870,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うええええええええええええええええ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Waaaaaaaahhhhhhh!"},{"lineNumber":119871,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさんてば……","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance-san, really..."},{"lineNumber":119872,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に悪い人」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're truly a bad person."},{"lineNumber":119873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、頭を撫でただけだぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I just patted your head!"},{"lineNumber":119874,"originalJapaneseLine":"　知らん知らん！　俺は悪くないぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know anything! It's not my fault!"},{"lineNumber":119875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっ！　なにアルカリア泣かせてんだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahh! What did you do to make Alcaria cry!"},{"lineNumber":119876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance-san?"},{"lineNumber":119877,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺はなにもしとらんわー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't do anything!"},{"lineNumber":119878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Well..."},{"lineNumber":119879,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何かあっても皆がいるから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if something happens, everyone is here."},{"lineNumber":119880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ね、そうでしょう？　アルカリア」","translatedEnglishLine":"Right? Isn't that so, Alcaria?"},{"lineNumber":119881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっく、ぐす……」","translatedEnglishLine":"*hic* sniff..."},{"lineNumber":119882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":119883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、そうですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, yes, it is."},{"lineNumber":119884,"originalJapaneseLine":"涙を浮かべながら、それでもアルカリアは微笑んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tears welled up, yet Alcaria still smiled."},{"lineNumber":119885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……温泉いいなあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew... hot springs sure are nice..."},{"lineNumber":119886,"originalJapaneseLine":"アルカリアが温泉に入ってまったりしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alcaria was relaxing in the hot spring."},{"lineNumber":119887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずばばーん！","translatedEnglishLine":"Zubabaan!"},{"lineNumber":119888,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がははは、俺様参上ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, I have arrived!"},{"lineNumber":119889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":119890,"originalJapaneseLine":"裸のランスを見てポカンとするアルカリア。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alcaria was dumbfounded upon seeing naked Lance."},{"lineNumber":119891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、一緒に入ろうぜー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, let's get in together!"},{"lineNumber":119892,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":119893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　アルカリア、どうした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hm? Alcaria, what's wrong?"},{"lineNumber":119894,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh..."},{"lineNumber":119895,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":119896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うえぇええぇ〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Waaaaaah~~~..."},{"lineNumber":119897,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、な、なんだ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, w-what is it?!"},{"lineNumber":119898,"originalJapaneseLine":"　急に泣くんじゃない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't suddenly start crying!"},{"lineNumber":119899,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、すみません……","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm sorry..."},{"lineNumber":119900,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、昔、色々、ぐすっ……あって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"In the past, I had various... sniff... things happen..."},{"lineNumber":119901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぐっ、ぐすっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, sniff..."},{"lineNumber":119902,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンク様以外の方の男性は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Men other than Lord Kessellink,"},{"lineNumber":119903,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ、ちょっと苦手で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm still a little uncomfortable with them..."},{"lineNumber":119904,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、だから少しビックリしただけで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"S-So I was just a little surprised..."},{"lineNumber":119905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううううううぇぇぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Uuuueee..."},{"lineNumber":119906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「少しって感じではないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"That doesn't feel like 'just a little'."},{"lineNumber":119907,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ええい、仕方ないな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, then, it can't be helped..."},{"lineNumber":119908,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほれほれ、アヒルさんだぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here here, it's a ducky!"},{"lineNumber":119909,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":119910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ぷきゅーっ、ぷきゅーっ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<quack, quack>"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達にはいくらでもあるのだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have as much time as we want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アルカリアの頭がシャロンの手によって撫でられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alcaria's head was gently stroked by Sharon's hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても優しく、少しでも傷を癒そうとするように。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Very gently, as if trying to heal even the slightest wound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっともそんな風には見えんがなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It doesn't look like that at all, though.
How about it? Am I scary too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デリカシーゼロでランスが
アルカリアの頭をぽんぽんした。
アルカリアはポカンとした直後――
「ぎょっ！　何も泣くことないだろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa! There's no reason to cry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うええええええええええええええええ！」
知らん知らん！　俺は悪くないぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know anything! It's not my fault!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーっ！　なにアルカリア泣かせてんだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahh! What did you do to make Alcaria cry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かあっても皆がいるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if something happens, everyone is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ね、そうでしょう？　アルカリア」
涙を浮かべながら、それでもアルカリアは微笑んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tears welled up, yet Alcaria still smiled.
Phew... hot springs sure are nice...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アルカリアが温泉に入ってまったりしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alcaria was relaxing in the hot spring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸のランスを見てポカンとするアルカリア。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alcaria was dumbfounded upon seeing naked Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、一緒に入ろうぜー」
「ん？　アルカリア、どうした？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the past, I had various... sniff... things happen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンク様以外の方の男性は、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm still a little uncomfortable with them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、だから少しビックリしただけで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S-So I was just a little surprised...
That doesn't feel like 'just a little'.
Well, then, it can't be helped...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれほれ、アヒルさんだぞー」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達にはいくらでもあるのだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have as much time as we want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アルカリアの頭がシャロンの手によって撫でられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alcaria's head was gently stroked by Sharon's hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても優しく、少しでも傷を癒そうとするように。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Very gently, as if trying to heal even the slightest wound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっともそんな風には見えんがなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It doesn't look like that at all, though.
How about it? Am I scary too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デリカシーゼロでランスが
アルカリアの頭をぽんぽんした。
アルカリアはポカンとした直後――
「ぎょっ！　何も泣くことないだろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa! There's no reason to cry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うええええええええええええええええ！」
知らん知らん！　俺は悪くないぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know anything! It's not my fault!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーっ！　なにアルカリア泣かせてんだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahh! What did you do to make Alcaria cry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かあっても皆がいるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if something happens, everyone is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ね、そうでしょう？　アルカリア」
涙を浮かべながら、それでもアルカリアは微笑んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tears welled up, yet Alcaria still smiled.
Phew... hot springs sure are nice...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アルカリアが温泉に入ってまったりしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alcaria was relaxing in the hot spring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸のランスを見てポカンとするアルカリア。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alcaria was dumbfounded upon seeing naked Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、一緒に入ろうぜー」
「ん？　アルカリア、どうした？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the past, I had various... sniff... things happen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンク様以外の方の男性は、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm still a little uncomfortable with them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、だから少しビックリしただけで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S-So I was just a little surprised...
That doesn't feel like 'just a little'.
Well, then, it can't be helped...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれほれ、アヒルさんだぞー」
